trans-unit.source: Represents the digitizer device of a Tablet PC.
trans-unit.target: Representa o dispositivo digitizer um Tablet PC.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> que reporta a entrada atual para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref> that reports current input for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref> que reporta a entrada atual para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador exclusivo para o dispositivo tablet no sistema.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the tablet device on the system.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo para o dispositivo tablet no sistema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O nome do dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the product identifier for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador de produto para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The manufacturer of the tablet device is responsible for adding this string.
trans-unit.target: O fabricante do dispositivo tablet é responsável pela adição desta cadeia.

trans-unit.source: The return value is empty if the tablet device does not have an identifier.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno está vazio se o dispositivo tablet não tem um identificador.

trans-unit.source: The product identifier for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de produto para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"></xref> associated with the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"> </xref> associados ao dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"></xref> associated with the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDeviceCollection"> </xref> associados ao dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> supports.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> objetos de que o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> suporta.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref> supports.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> objetos de que o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref> suporta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"></xref> for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"> </xref> para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"></xref> for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletHardwareCapabilities"> </xref> para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> que fornece processamento de entrada básico para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that provides basic input processing for the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> que fornece processamento de entrada básico para o dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o nome do dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"></xref> of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"> </xref> do dispositivo tablet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"></xref> of the tablet device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDeviceType"> </xref> do dispositivo tablet.
